headline.main: BARDIA IS 'PASSIVE' TO BRITISH SIEGE; Italian Force in Beleagured Libyan Port Merely Awaits 'Events,' Cairo Reports OTHER BASES ARE BOMBED Airdromes Set Afire in Raids -- Most of Graziani's Army Held Checkmated
